data.actual_result: The link either doesn't jump up or if the link was posted in a different server/different channel, it will redirect you to that channel but not jump to the message
data.expected_result: The link should redirect you/jump you to the message it is linked too
data.short_description: Message links/jump links do not jump to the message they are linked too
data.steps_to_repro: - Scroll up once and find a message - Go to that message and click the 3 dot menu/overflow menu - Click the "Copy Link" option - Paste it in that same channel or a different server/different channel - Click on the link
